LanguageData.Apparel_PolarisShieldBelt_IV.label: polaris - IV shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_PolarisShieldBelt_IV.description: The latest generation of shield from the Polarisbloc, only for important personnel.\n\nThe shield will counter attack the attacker if the wearer is attacked. Although the counterattack have a cooling time, be careful, the counterattack is very precise.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardArmor.label: cygnus standard armor
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardArmor.descript: The standard Cygnus armor of Security Forces provides a small amount of defensive capabilities and combat attributes.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardArmorC.label: cygnus standard armor (captain)
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardArmorC.descrip: The Captain version of the Cygnus armor is slightly improved of the original, but it is still very limited.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardTights.label: cygnus standard tights
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CygnusStandardTights.descrip: The Cygnus tights made of polymer materials contain special life-sustaining devices that can treat the user's wounds in time and promote wound healing.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_AlkaidStrategyAssistant.desc: The Universal Tactical assistant is a device that can assist the user predict enemy movement trends.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_ThubanTacticalGoggles.label: Thuban tactical goggles
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_ThubanTacticalGoggles.descri: The Universal Tactical goggles produced by the Polarisbloc enhance effectively the sight of the user.
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_BodyFixTrigger.label: Body Fix Trigger
